root.title: j.c penney jcp februari sale 5.3 pct
root.body: j.c penney co inc say sale four week end februari 28 jcpenney store catalog 5.3 pct 780 mln dlr 741 mln dlr year earlier compar store sale 5.5 pct compani say total compani sale period 6.0 pct 888 mln dlr 838 mln dlr same-stor sale 6.3 pct
